passive.description: Increases the resistances of allies within 9m by 15%.

basicAttacks.description: [Basic Attack]: Deals [Damage Rate: 90%] Magic Damage. Can cast [Holy Feather] every 5s.Deals [Damage Rate: 150%] Magic Damage to the targetand heals [Healing Rate: 90%] HP for up to 3 allies within14m.

Replaces Basic Attack with [Holy Smite].After a 0.5s cast, calls down holy smite at the targetlocation, dealing [Damage Rate: 80%] Magic Damage toall players ([Damage Rate: 160%] Magic Damage tomobs). Heals the caster for [Healing Rate: 57%] HP ifhitting at least one enemy.
Replaces Basic Attack with [Holy Heal].After a 1.5s cast, performs holy healing at the targetlocation, restoring [Healing Rate: 108%] HP to allies in range.

commonSkills.description: Projects a holy wave in the target direction, dealing [Damage Rate: 200%] Magic Damage to all players([Damage Rate: 300%] Magic Damage to mobs) in itspath. The wave automatically returns when reaching maxrange, healing up to 5 nearby allies for [Healing Rate: 90%] HP.

Channels divine link on target for 6s, also granting thecaster  [Target-based Max HP 15%] Shield for 4s. Canmove slowly while channeling.When targeting an ally, heals them for [Healing Rate: 120%] HP every second.When targeting an enemy, deals [Damage Rate: 100%]Magic Damage every second.
Projects holy energy at the target location. On impact,restores [Healing Rate: 90%] HP and grants a[Target-based Max HP 20%] shield for 4s to allies inrange.

Creates multiple holy walls in front. Enemies who touch them take [Damage Rate: 150%] Magic Damage and are stunned for 1.5 seconds, while the caster gains a [Based on Target's Max HP 15%] shield for 6 seconds.

Cleanses all Slow and Immobilize effects and 2 Debuffeffects from the caster and up to 20 nearby allies andrestores [Healing Rate: 120%] HP. Also prevents the next 3Immobilize and Immune to Slow effects within 4s.

skills.description: Grants a shield of  [Target-based Max HP 25%] to thecaster or an ally for 4s.When the shield breaks, deals [Damage Rate: 250%] MagicDamage to nearby enemies.

Leaps to the target location. Upon landing, deals [Damage Rate: 300%] Magic Damage to all enemies in range and inflicts Knockup for 0.75s. Heals allies in range for [Healing Rate: 180%] Vitality and increases their Overclock Reflexes Passive by 30% for 6s.

Launches a Holy Chain that bounces to the nearest alliedtarget within 9 meters after hitting an ally, restoring [Healing Rate: 120%] HP with each hit. It deals  [Damage Rate: 100%] Magic Damage to up to 5 enemy targets inrange, with damage reduced to 20% for subsequentexplosions.The chain can bounce up to 9 times, and each target canbe hit a maximum of 3 times.

Creates a holy domain that deals [Damage Rate: 300%]Magic Damage to enemies in range and knocks them back10m. Channels for 3s, healing allies in range for  [Healing Rate: 60%] HP every 0.5s and increasing their DamageResistance by 10% for 6s. Stacks up to 3 times.

Casts holy radiance at the target location. Heals allies inrange for [Healing Rate: 120%] HP and deals  [Damage Rate: 300%] Magic Damage to enemies, knocking themback 7m from the center. Gives enemies 60% chance tomiss Basic Attacks and reveals Stealth for 6s.

Creates a Blessed Halo at the target location. After 1s,heals all allies in range for [Healing Rate: 360%] HP,cleanses all control effects and 5 debuffs, and grantsimmunity to Control and Slow for 4s.

Cleanses an ally or the caster of all Slow and Immobilizeeffects, heals [Healing Rate: 360%] HP and grantsSanctuary for 5s.Sanctuary grants immunity to Slow and Immobilize, andprevents HP from falling below 1. Each 10% of missingHP increases healing received by 5%.Sanctuary cannot be dispelled.

Summons Black Sun, lasting 15s. Every 3 seconds, the Black Sun deals [Damage Rate: 120%] Magic Damage to enemies in range, inflicts [Charm] for 1 s, and reduces their Magic Resistance by 67 for 5s. This effect can stack up to 5 times.
(Charm): Moves slowly toward the caster, unable to use Skills or Move during this time.
The Black Sun is destroyed after taking 6 instances of Basic Attack Damage
